testcase.name: register - when a subject is registered, the newly persisted subject must be returned()
assignGroup - when a user group is assigned to a subject, the modified subject must be returned()
login - when the user logs in and the authentication is successful, the http status 200 must be returned along with the jwt()
allUsers - when a list of users is request and the service returns an empty list, an empty result must be returned()
userById - when a specific user is requested, it must be returned()
allUsers - when a list of users is requested, they must be returned()
delete - when a subject is deleted but it doesn't exist, a response with status code 230 must be returned()
login - when the user logs in and the authentication is fails, the http status 401 must be returned()
delete - when a subject is deleted, a response with status code 204 must be returned()
